TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CharEnumerator extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<char>, class System.Collections.IEnumerator, class System.ICloneable, class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class CharEnumerator Implements ICloneable, IEnumerator(Of Char)
public ref class CharEnumerator sealed : ICloneable, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerator<char>
type CharEnumerator = class interface IEnumerator interface ICloneable interface IEnumerator<char> interface IDisposable

summary.span: Supports iterating over a object and reading its individual characters.

span.span: Supports iterating over a object and reading its individual characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A提供对中的引用的字符的只读访问权限对象。A provides read-only access to the characters in a referenced object. 例如，`foreach`语句的 Microsoft Visual Basic 和 C# 的编程语言，它循环访问集合的元素，检索从以循环访问在于个字符的对象对象。For example, the `foreach` statement of the Microsoft Visual Basic and C# programming languages, which iterates through the elements of a collection, retrieves a from a object in order to iterate through the characters in that object. 没有没有公共构造函数。There is no public constructor for . 而应调用对象的方法来获取以便经初始化引用字符串。Instead, call a object's method to obtain a that is initialized to reference the string. A保持到字符串中字符的内部索引引用。A maintains an internal index to the characters in the string the references. 引用字符串内的字符时，索引的状态是无效的; 当它引用字符串中的字符位置逻辑上第一个字符之前或之后的最后一个字符和有效。The state of the index is invalid when it references a character position logically before the first character or after the last character in the string, and valid when it references a character within the string. 索引函数将初始化为逻辑上之前的第一个字符的位置，并设置到的位置后的最后一个字符迭代完成后。The index is initialized to a position logically before the first character, and is set to a position after the last character when the iteration is complete. 如果你尝试访问该字符，该索引无效时，将引发异常。An exception is thrown if you attempt to access a character while the index is invalid. 方法索引递增 1，因此反过来访问的第一个和后续字符。The method increments the index by one, so the first and subsequent characters are accessed in turn. 方法设置为逻辑上之前的第一个字符的位置的索引。The method sets the index to a position logically before the first character. 属性检索当前引用的索引的字符。The property retrieves the character currently referenced by index. 方法会创建一份。The method creates a copy of the . > [!NOTE] > 几个独立实例跨一个或多个线程可以有权访问的单个实例。Several independent instances of across one or more threads can have access to a single instance of . 实现此类是为了支持接口。This class is implemented to support the interface. 有关使用枚举器的详细信息，请参阅主题。For more information regarding the use of an enumerator, see the topic. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类来枚举字符串中的每个字符。The following example uses the class to enumerate the individual characters in a string. 它实例化对象通过调用方法，将从移动一个字符到下一步通过调用方法，并通过检索的值的显示的当前字符属性。It instantiates a object by calling the method, moves from one character to the next by calling the method, and displays the current character by retrieving the value of the property. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#1)] 但请注意，可以通过使用某种程度上更直观地执行同一操作`foreach`（在 C# 中) 或`For Each`（在 Visual Basic 中)，如以下示例所示。Note, however, that the same operation can be performed somewhat more intuitively by using `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (in Visual Basic), as the following example shows. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#2)]

abstract member Clone : unit -> obj override this.Clone : unit -> obj

summary.span: Creates a copy of the current object.

span.span: Creates a copy of the current object.

returns.span: An that is a copy of the current object.

span.span: An that is a copy of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值是此实例的副本及其当前状态。The return value is a copy of this instance of and its current state. 这可用于循环访问时保存状态对象。This is useful for saving your state while iterating through a object. 例如，假定你的应用程序使用的原始实例来循环访问中的每个字符。For example, suppose your application uses an original instance of to iterate through each character in a . 当遇到某些唯一字符时，你的应用程序暂停处理，并调用方法。When some unique character is encountered, your application pauses processing and invokes the method. 实际上，这将保存中的对象的索引。In effect, this saves the object's index in the . 你的应用程序使用克隆导航到的另一部分`String`执行一些辅助处理。Your application uses the clone to navigate to another part of the `String` to perform some auxiliary processing. 此导航的副作用是位置的克隆会失去对跟踪的处理停止时所在。The side-effect of this navigation is the clone loses track of the position where processing stopped. 但是，辅助处理完成后，则你的应用程序将放弃克隆并使用原始实例继续处理原始处理停止的位置。However, when the auxiliary processing is complete, your application discards the clone and uses the original instance to resume working on the where the original processing stopped. > [!NOTE] > 实现此方法是为了支持接口。This method is implemented to support the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As Char
public: property char Current { char get(); };

summary.span: Gets the currently referenced character in the string enumerated by this object.

span.span: Gets the currently referenced character in the string enumerated by this object.

value.span: 当前引用此的 Unicode 字符对象。

span.span: The Unicode character currently referenced by this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类维护的枚举字符串的内部索引和属性返回由索引当前引用的字符。The class maintains an internal index to the enumerated string, and the property returns the character that is currently referenced by the index. 仅当此索引有效; 时，才应调用此属性否则，会引发异常。This property should be invoked only when the index is valid; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 该索引无效始终为空字符串 ("")。The index is always invalid for an empty string (""). 该索引无效也后或调用方法。The index is also invalid after the or method is called. 任一方法调用后，调用方法调整到枚举字符串中的第一个字符的索引。After either of these methods is called, invoke the method to adjust the index to the first character in the enumerated string. 此索引是否有效每当方法返回`true`。The index is valid whenever the method returns `true`. 不会移动的索引和对连续调用返回之前的相同字符， ，或调用。 does not move the index, and consecutive calls to return the same character until , , or is called. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类来枚举字符串中的每个字符。The following example uses the class to enumerate the individual characters in a string. 它实例化对象通过调用方法，将从移动一个字符到下一步通过调用方法，并通过检索的值的显示的当前字符属性。It instantiates a object by calling the method, moves from one character to the next by calling the method, and displays the current character by retrieving the value of the property. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#1)] 但请注意，可以通过使用某种程度上更直观地执行同一操作`foreach`（在 C# 中) 或`For Each`（在 Visual Basic 中)，如以下示例所示。Note, however, that the same operation can be performed somewhat more intuitively by using `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (in Visual Basic), as the following example shows. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#2)]

exception.span: The index is invalid; that is, it is before the first or after the last character of the enumerated string.

span.span: The index is invalid; that is, it is before the first or after the last character of the enumerated string.

abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

abstract member MoveNext : unit -> bool override this.MoveNext : unit -> bool

summary.span: Increments the internal index of the current object to the next character of the enumerated string.

span.span: Increments the internal index of the current object to the next character of the enumerated string.

returns.span: if the index is successfully incremented and within the enumerated string; otherwise, .

span.span: if the index is successfully incremented and within the enumerated string; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类维护的枚举字符串的内部索引和方法索引递增 1。The class maintains an internal index to the enumerated string, and the method increments the index by one. 调用之后调用或递增到第一个字符中的枚举字符串的当前字符位置。Call after calling or to increment the current character position to the first character in the enumerated string. 检查返回的值是否`true`以确定当前字符位置是否有效。Check that the return value is `true` to determine that the current character position is valid. 如果索引已超出枚举字符串的最后一个字符，不会更改索引和`false`返回。If the index is already beyond the last character of the enumerated string, the index is not changed and `false` is returned. 请注意，如果枚举的字符串为空 ("")，则状态的始终无效。Notice that if the enumerated string is empty (""), the state of the is always invalid. 这是因为的内部索引最初之前枚举字符串的第一个字符，因此无效。This is because the internal index for the is initially before the first character of the enumerated string and is therefore invalid. 逻辑上也是无效的枚举字符串的最后一个 （不存在） 字符之后设置的索引。 logically sets the index after the last (nonexistent) character of the enumerated string which is also invalid. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类来枚举字符串中的每个字符。The following example uses the class to enumerate the individual characters in a string. 它实例化对象通过调用方法，将从移动一个字符到下一步通过调用方法，并通过检索的值的显示的当前字符属性。It instantiates a object by calling the method, moves from one character to the next by calling the method, and displays the current character by retrieving the value of the property. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#1)] 但请注意，可以通过使用某种程度上更直观地执行同一操作`foreach`（在 C# 中) 或`For Each`（在 Visual Basic 中)，如以下示例所示。Note, however, that the same operation can be performed somewhat more intuitively by using `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (in Visual Basic), as the following example shows. [!code-cpp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cpp/charenumerator1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/cs/CharEnumerator1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.CharEnumerator.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CharEnumerator.Class/vb/CharEnumerator1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
